During face to face mode Students are required to: 1. wear identification cards at all times; 2. wear face mask at all times 3. observe physical/social distancing at all times 4. clean the classroom before and after classes; 5. avoid unnecessary noise that might disturb other classes; 6. practice good manners and right conduct at all times; 7. practice gender sensitivity and awareness inside the classroom; and 8. come to class on time. During distance mode Students are required to: 1. sign an honor system pledge; 2. avoid giving or receiving unauthorized aid of any kind on their examinations, papers, projects and assignments, 3. observe proper netiquette during on-line activities, and 4. submit take home assignments on time.
